mapper.update: update wlan_cft set info_id = #{infoId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, wlan_cft_count = #{wlanCftCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, wlan_cft_ant = #{wlanCftAnt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, wlan_cft_model = #{wlanCftModel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, wlan_cft_freq = #{wlanCftFreq,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, wlan_cft_result = #{wlanCftResult,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, wlan_cft_judgement = #{wlanCftJudgement,jdbcType=BIT}, wlan_cft_time = #{wlanCftTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, wlan_cft_delete = #{wlanCftDelete,jdbcType=BIT} where wlan_cft_id = #{wlanCftId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
